VectorHDSConcept Class Reference

Vertex HDS concept definition. More...

#include <vertex_hds_concept.hpp>

Detailed Description

Vertex HDS concept definition.

Definition
This class provides a concept checking for the VertexHDSConcept, i.e., using the statement boost::function_requires<VertexHDSConcept<HDS> >() inside a function body, or BOOST_CLASS_REQUIRE(HDS, boost::hdstl, VertexHDSConcept) inside a class definition body, should trigger a compile-time error if the type HDS does not model the VertexHDSConcept.
Refinement of
HDSConcept
Associated types
  • X::vertex_descriptor : Must be DefaultConstructible, CopyConstuctible, EqualityComparable, Assignable
Notation
  • X A type that is a model of VertexHDSConcept
  • h halfedge descriptors
  • v vertex descriptor
Definitions
halfedge descriptor is a pointer to access the halfedge
Valid Expressions
Expression Semantics
